name: Ramada Wisconsin Dells

reviews.text: We stayed here at the end of the summer, perfect location. Right off the interstate, across from the liquor store, across from Marley's Restaurant. This is a brand new hotel. We stayed in a family suite which was 1 bathroom, a bedroom with 2 queen beds, a bedroom with a king bed, table and chairs, wet bar and kitchen area.The only thing I did not care for was we were across from the elevators and I could here them most of the night. Our room was not ready when we got there at 2:45 because check in was 4 PM but they hurried and had it ready by 3:45 so we could make the 4:30 Tommy Bartlett show with our 3 year old. We used the indoor pool which was a good size and great temperature. We loved that we could walk to Marley's and have dinner and drinks without driving. We already are planning to stay here again with friends. The room was such a great deal for a large room.
reviews.title: Brand New Perfect Location
The experience from reservation through check-out was...
reviews.text: The experience from reservation through check-out was freindly and efficient. Acommodations were as expected and breakfast was tasty and well supplied. Shower experince could have been better. While the pool was fun, the sauna was well received.

The Ramada Wisconsin Dells is a great place to stay for a weekend visit. I found the lacation perfect, as it right off the highway and away from the crowds of downtown. It is very clean, inviting and the front desk staff were extremely pleasant and helpful!
reviews.title: Lovely, clean place....

reviews.text: We spent three nights in the Ramada from 11th - 14th August as two families of 4 with adjoining doors to each room.
reviews.title: Dated but pleasant

reviews.text: Service outstanding! The pool was clean and warm. Rooms were clean but had a musty odor. The Mattress was very poor my hips hurt and my grandson who is 9 said his shoulders hurt. Other than that the location and stay was great.
reviews.title: Vacation

reviews.text: We stayed two nights at the beginning of August. Rooms were clean. Staff was nice. Breakfast room was a little small and filled up easily. We took ours back to our room.
reviews.title: Nice stay.

reviews.text: My family of 7 stayed there on Sept 1st and we had a great time. The rooms were clean and the beds super comfy. We did have an issue with our in room fridge. I let Rob know about it on our way out to dinner and he had someone go an clean it real good while we were gone. When we came back from dinner, he asked me to check the fridge and see if the smell was gone. It wasn't and I went back downstairs to let him know and he said that a new one would be brought up within 15 mins. He was right, they brought us a new fridge, it was a little smaller than the one we had, but still, it worked and didn't smell.
reviews.title: Fantastic Customer Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: They were very accommodating as well. My daughter received a present that required 4- AA batteries and we kept forgetting to go an buy them when we were out shopping. I stopped at the front desk to see if they sold them and was just given the 4 batteries that we needed. To top it off, my husband had an upset stomache from dinner (dont eat at the Mexicali Rose) and wanted some milk, again I went to the front desk to see if their little store had some, which it didn't. So I asked the lady at the front desk who went and got me a cup from their kitchen that they use for breakfast.
reviews.title: Nice 3 days

description: Enjoy a complimentary hot waffle breakfast, reading a complimentary USA Today newspaper, while uploading your vacation pictures using our complimentary high speed internet!
